
```{r}
remove.packages(c("ggplot2","dplyr","readr","survival","survminer"))

```


```{r}
# Make sure R installs only binary versions
options(pkgType = "binary")

```

```{r}
install.packages("ggplot2")     # Binary version
install.packages("dplyr")       # Binary version
install.packages("readr")       # Binary version
install.packages("survival")    # Binary version
install.packages("survminer")   # Binary version

```


```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(survival)
library(survminer)


```
